</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if given object can be stored into soldier's uniform. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> unit [[canAddItemToUniform]] [item, count] <template><title>since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55.133607</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_item = "HandGrenade";

} [[else]] {
